page.title: 16Trade in Jedburgh
page.content: In Jedburgh there is a blend of old and new shops.The Hive is a new souvenir shop.The owners make and sell craft goods.Grant's the bakers is an old established firm selling cakes and bread rolls.There is an Intarsia knitwear factory shop that makes and sells its own product.There are two self-service grocery shops.Cockburn's a traditional grocery shop in Castlegate specialises in wines and cheeses.Victoria Wines has recently opened a shop in the High Street.It belongs to a chain of wine shops.The Art Gallery owned by local artists sells art and crafts of Borders' craftsmen.There are many new giftshops to cater for the rise in tourism.Most every-day goods can be bought in Jedburgh.An office of Consumers' and Trading Protection is also here.
